ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR( ((ISCHANGED(FirstName) || ISCHANGED(MiddleName) || ISCHANGED(LastName)) && ($Profile.Name = 'Non-Sales User Profile' || $Profile.Name = 'Nokia Read Only' || $Profile.Name = 'Nokia Sales Profile' || $Profile.Name ='PRM Partner Relationship Manager Login' || $Profile.Name ='PRM Partner Community User Login')), (ISCHANGED( Email ) && ($Profile.Name = 'Non-Sales User Profile' || $Profile.Name = 'Nokia Read Only' || $Profile.Name = 'Nokia Sales Profile' || $Profile.Name ='PRM Partner Relationship Manager Login' || $Profile.Name ='PRM Partner Community User Login' || $Profile.Name ='Sales Ops Profile')), (ISCHANGED( AccountId ) && ($Profile.Name = 'Non-Sales User Profile' || $Profile.Name = 'Nokia Read Only' || $Profile.Name = 'Nokia Sales Profile' || $Profile.Name ='PRM Partner Relationship Manager Login' || $Profile.Name ='PRM Partner Community User Login' || $Profile.Name ='Sales Ops Profile') ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You are not allowed to edit these fields.
